title: I can't get any chest :|
body:
Hi Riot, i played a lot of league of legend and in the last 2 week i didn't got any chest. I had multiple S-,S and S+but even with that i can only get key fragment but no chest. Can you guys explain to me why and how the chest system work (the "golden" square on the icon of the champ) 

-Thx for anwsering  ps: I love this game <3

replies.body:
If I'm thinking of the right icon, that golden chest means you've already got the chest from that champion for this month. To put it simply, you can only get one chest from each champion per season. Also, you only have 4 chest slots which unlock 7 days after you got the first one. 

Check out our [**Hextech Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for all the other little details about crafting too!
